column1: #This correspondence test_scaffolds2.cut250.tigmint.fa.k32.w150.z1000.stitch.abyss-scaffold_c4_m8-10000_cut250_k20_r0.05_e30000_z1000_l4_a0.3.assembly_correspondence.tsv file lists the scaffold ID and contig ID used by LINKS (reported in the .scaffolds file), with the original contig name in the provided assembly file (-f test_scaffolds2.cut250.tigmint.fa.k32.w150.z1000.stitch.abyss-scaffold.renamed.fa)
